. Socorro is a popular regional tourism destination, offering quite varied attractions including mineral springs, eco-adventure, a vibrant shopping scene and an interesting Historic Center, with several Ecletic constructions, a legacy of Italian immigration.
Socorro's city center contains many ecletic constructions, a legacy of Italian immigration from XIX-early XX centuries. Unfortunately, it is not as preserved or as picturesque as
, with the historical constructions often mixed with uninteresting modern buildings.
